## BaseExtensionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseExtensionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [exclude](./core-types.baseextensionoptions.exclude.md) | <code>ExcludeOptions</code> | A configuration object which allows for excluding certain functionality from an extension. |
|  [extraAttrs](./core-types.baseextensionoptions.extraattrs.md) | <code>ExtraAttrs[]</code> | Inject additional attributes into the defined mark / node schema. This can only be used for <code>NodeExtensions</code> and <code>MarkExtensions</code>. |
|  [extraStyles](./core-types.baseextensionoptions.extrastyles.md) | <code>RemirrorInterpolation</code> | Add extra styles to the extension. |
